targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'neutron' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'GET' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'POST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'PUT' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'DELETE' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_check_api" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^2/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^1/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^4/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'neutron-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'neutron-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'l3' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'metadata' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'openvswitch' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'l3' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'metadata' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'openvswitch' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'l3' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'metadata' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "service" = 'openvswitch' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_networks" WHERE "state" = 'active' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_networks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_subnets" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_subnets" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_ports" WHERE "owner" = 'compute' AND "state" = 'active' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_ports" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "owner" fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_routers" WHERE "state" = 'active' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_routers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_floatingips" WHERE "state" = 'associated' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_floatingips" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "state" fill(0)

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname

list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'neutron'
